comment.author: 91997797@N00
comment._content:
Ancient photograph (June 1892)
The photograph is either faded or overexposed.
The subject is of part of a building with two levels of open archways, a bit like a Roman aqueduct.  The function of this part of the building is not clear.  There are vines clinging to parts of the building. 
There is a man looking towards the building and a couple(?) of faintly exposed human figures in the foreground.  This makes me wonder how long the exposure took.
In front of part of the building there appears to be a large collection of plants in pots arranged for viewing.
